item.title: The Inner Game
item.description: There are inspirations in my head from time to time. I’m documenting them here as fuel for my side project of writing a book. ðŸ”– Two Worlds The calendar years 2022 - 2023 are the milestones for my spiritual growth. I feel and see that there are two systems. The visible one is created by human beings over ages, where everyone sort of finds a path to follow. This path is designed with rules, fame, monetary values.
